title: Mediterranean filo pastry pie
description: Equipment and preparation: You'll need a non-stick lipless baking sheet about 34cm x 30cm/13in x 12in.
ingredients: 225g/9oz packet ready-made filo pastry, fresh or frozen (you'll need about ten sheets measuring about 34cm x 30cm/13in x 12in or larger in size)
1 large red onion, halved and sliced finely
salt and freshly ground black pepper
